DOC.criteria: age＜36years , PCOS , Insulin resistance ( HOMAIR = fast insulin ( FINS ) × fast blood glucose ( FPG ) / 22.5 , HOMAIR ≥ 2.69 ） ; uterine abnormality ( double uterus , bicornuate uterus , unicornuate uterus uterine mediastinum ) , intrauterine adhesion , endometriosis , adenomyosis , Hydrosalpinx , uterine fibroid ( submucosal fibroid , nonmucosal fibroid > 4 cm / endometrial pressure ) , Hyroid dysfunction hyperprolactinemia .
